devdesign.name: Rage Click
devdesign.description: An amusing, web-based game to show off Fullstory's capabilities to analyze, understand and predict user behavior, while educating players about "dark web patterns" (deceptive practices designed to confuse and trick users).

devdesign.name: PuppySpot
devdesign.description: Front end web development for the redesign of PuppySpot.com, connecting loving owners with a nationwide network of responsible breeders.

devdesign.name: Outdodge Trailer
devdesign.description: Video design and editing of the trailer for the mobile video game Outdodge from Ludoko Studios. Available now for iOS and Android.

devdesign.name: Milkfed Criminal Masterminds
devdesign.description: The production company of television and comic book writers Kelly Sue DeConnick & Matt Fraction. Milkfed Criminal Masterminds is home to award-winning comic series such as Casanova, ODY-C and Pretty Deadly.

devdesign.name: Taft Design + Associates
devdesign.description: Taft Design + Associates is a specialty international design studio Headquartered in Pasadena, California. They provide exhibit architecture and graphic design for resorts and museums. Clients include: Disney, Universal Studios and the American Film Institute.

devdesign.name: 2016 Mixtape
devdesign.description: A mix tape of my work in front end web design and development from 2016. Featured projects include work for the interactive experience firm Taft Design and the comic book creative collective Milkfed Criminal Masterminds. Audio: Habits (Stay High) - Hippie Sabotage Remix by Tove Lo

devdesign.name: 2015 Mixtape
devdesign.description: Projects from the year 2015 in web design and development. Featured projects for USA Network, Adluh Mills, Penguin Randomhouse and Balboa Park featuring the song "Half Bad" by White Reaper.

devdesign.name: DIG Decoded
devdesign.description: A weekly series of online puzzle games for the 10-episode television event from USA network. As players solved each week’s puzzle additional video content expanding the world of DIG was unlocked.

devdesign.name: Balboa Park Explorer Tickets
devdesign.description: Online ticket purchasing system for visitors to Balboa Park in San Diego, California. Guests cam compare a variety of single and multi-day passes, calculate total cost for their visit and pay online.

devdesign.name: Voyagers HQ
devdesign.description: The main site for the children’s science fiction book series Voyagers from Penguin Randomhouse. Introduction to the story and the world of Voyagers as well as links to purchase books in the series on multiple online platforms.

devdesign.name: 2014 Mixtape
devdesign.description: Web design and web development work from the year 2014. Featured projects include freelance work for GoDaddy, Sony Pictures and CNN. Audio: "Walk of Shame" by Deap Vally.

devdesign.name: Transformers 4: Age of Extinction
devdesign.description: Responsive web development for the marketing of the major motion picture Transformers 4: Age of Extinction for Sony Pictures. Users could view stills from the film, watch trailers, download digital posters and link to other online content.

devdesign.name: inFAMOUS 2: Paper Trail
devdesign.description: A series of online mini-games released on a weekly basis to accompany players of the video game inFAMOUS 2: Second Son. As players followed both the story of inFAMOUS 2: Paper Trail a new in-game mystery unfolded.

devdesign.name: CNN.com for iPad
devdesign.description: User experience and interface concept design work specifically for the news network’s website on iPad. USer’s were given the ability to jump between a live feed of the network and a library of content from the network’s various shows.

devdesign.name: ABC Family
devdesign.description: User interface and experience concept visualizations and animations for the redesign and relaunch of ABC Family and ABC.com.

devdesign.name: Nickelodeon Universe: Mall of America
devdesign.description: Development of kiosk based interactive games for Spongebob Squarepant's "Great Spatula Caper", a part of Nickelodeon's Universe of Adventure at the Mall of America in Minnesota.

devdesign.name: South Carolina State Treasurer
devdesign.description: Redesigned site for the treasurer of the State of South Carolina. Built to display appropriately on desktop computers, tablet computers and mobile smart phones.

devdesign.name: 2012 Mixtape
devdesign.description: A reel showing some of the projects I worked on in 2012. Web design and web development done for and on both coasts of the United States. The song featured is "Kick Out the Jams" by The MC5.

devdesign.name: The Amazing Spider-Man
devdesign.description: Viral sites for Sony Picture's The Amazing Spider-Man: Mark of the Spider-Man, Webbed Menace, Parker's POV and Oscorp Industries. Users participated in geo-location scavenger hunts, photo uploading contests, picture puzzle solving and games.

devdesign.name: 2013 Ford Fusion
devdesign.description: Random Acts of Fusion was the hub of a TV & social media campaign showcasing cross country live events including: NASCAR, Fashion's Night Out, Bite of Seattle and more. Costarring Ryan Seacrest, Joel McHale and Kate Micucci.

devdesign.name: La Lola Loca food truck
devdesign.description: Designed and developed a fully responsive website (desktop / tablet / mobile) for the Latin American food truck chain serving 7 locations from Baylor University to the University of Florida.

devdesign.name: Defenders of Speed
devdesign.description: E-commerce site for the Mini Cooper performance parts company. Design and development for the site including a fully responsive build allowing online purchases from desktop, tablet and mobile devices.

devdesign.name: Fan Boy food truck
devdesign.description: Designed and built a fully responsive website (desktop / tablet / mobile) for the anime-themed rice bowl food truck Fán Boy. They have an entree called Dragon Bowl Z. Do you need to know anything else?

devdesign.name: 2011 Mixtape
devdesign.description: A design reel showcasing a few of the projects I worked on in 2011. Web design, banner ads and application development are included. You get to see my gorgeous face. The song "Threshold" by Beck is played loudly.

devdesign.name: The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo
devdesign.description: Mouth Taped Shut was a site teasing exclusive behind the scenes images from the set of the film Girl with the Dragon Tattoo to promote the film and its soundtrack prerelease serving as a social media hub for discussion of the movie.

devdesign.name: 5 Gum - Survival Code
devdesign.description: Online puzzle game and nationwide alternate reality scavenger hunt. The site was promoted through TV commercials, a live event at Bonnaroo and QR codes on 40 million packs of gum.

devdesign.name: Real Steel - World Robot Boxing
devdesign.description: Website for the fictitious World Robot Boxing for the film Real Steel from Dreamworks. Content added weekly expanding from a history of robot boxing, to exploring a robot, to designing a custom robot boxer to train and fight online.
